Roberta Johnson

Digital Marketing

Roberta Johnson is a seasoned marketing professional and creative enthusiast with a passion for helping individuals master the art of brand identity design. With over a decade of experience in the marketing field, Roberta has worked with diverse brands, both established and emerging, to develop visually compelling and strategically aligned brand identities.

Connect with Roberta on LinkedIn to stay updated on her latest insights and industry contributions.
